tests.suggestion: Various UI-UX improvement such as display width, page organisation.
tests.response: Most are accepted and are implemented. Some are being implemented.
Page reloads upon applying a filter. Implemented.
Hyperlinks to individual posts are provided, but direct sharing of post on platform will not be implemented.

tests.suggestion: Pending friend request when friend request sent instead of default add friend button.
tests.response: Rejected. We do not want users to track their outgoing friend requests.
Implemented. Matching results can contain either matching name or username. Searching with '@' in front yields results with usernames only.

tests.suggestion: My own posts in home page.
tests.response: Implemented. Users are now able to view their own posts in home page.
